description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the weaponry of ARMA 3 S.O.G. Prairie Fire, including the XM16E1 with the underbarrel XM148 grenade launcher, a suppressed Model 10 revolver, and the iconic El Cid RPD.

00:00 - Intro
00:35 - K50M
02:22 - KBKG
03:51 - L1A1 SAS
05:13 - M203
06:30 - XM16E1 with XM148
10:02 - M1 Carbine Suppressed Shorty
11:20 - Model 10 Suppressed
12:47 - M1897 Shotgun
14:33 - M45 SMG Suppressed
16:37 - RPD Shorty (El Cid)
19:05 - Mk 1 UDG

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down the guns of ARMA 3 S.O.G. Prairie Fire and compares them to their real-life counterparts.

If you're interested in seeing more of Jonathan's work, you can check out more from the Royal Armouries right here. - https://www.youtube.com/user/RoyalArmouries

If you would like to support the Royal Armourie
title: Firearms Expert Reacts To ARMA 3 S.O.G. Prairie Fire’s Guns
